title: Find a Cure

Enough. Just tell me what's our next move. All right. You made your point. Leave.

Upon choosing the first option, she says if what Zorru said was true and if there are githyanki west of here, that must be our current objective. Your next set of choices will look like this:

Heh - did you say 'teeth-ling'? What do you mean 'purification'? Leave.

Lae'zel says that the crèche holds the zaith'isk and it will cleanse us of the parasite upo
